testcase.name: useApiClient > should initialize with Idle status
useApiClient > getAll should call GET request and set success state
useApiClient > get should call GET request with ID and set success state
useApiClient > add should call POST request and set success state
useApiClient > update should call PUT request and set success state
useApiClient > remove should call DELETE request and set success state
useApiClient > should set error state if url is missing
useApiClient > should handle AxiosError with response for 404 Not Found
useApiClient > should handle AxiosError with response for 400 Bad Request
useApiClient > should handle AxiosError with request but no response
useApiClient > should handle a generic unexpected error
